summary: A core abstraction that wires together encoder‑decoder components for classification tasks, handling configuration‑driven data loading, preprocessing, model construction, loss and metric setup, and providing unified forward and transcription inference pathways.
business_intent: To give developers a reusable scaffold for rapidly building, training, validating, testing, and exporting encoder‑decoder classifiers—such as speech or audio labeling models—by encapsulating common setup and inference logic.
